headline: Is Salesforce’s (CRM) AI Strategy a Bold Move or a Risky Bet? RBC Remains Cautious
summary: Salesforce Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the best stocks to buy according to Citadel LLC. October 15 was an important day for the company, as it held its annual Dreamforce 2025 event, during which management outlined its long-term strategy. Among other things, management announced its FY 2030 target of exceeding $60 billion in sales, implying an […]

headline: TD Cowen Remains Bullish on Salesforce (CRM), Cites Strong Enterprise Software Positioning
summary: Man GLG holds $353.09 million worth of Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) stock, representing 0.67% of its 13-F portfolio as of Q2 2025. The company is one of Man GLG’s list of 10 stock picks with the highest upside potential. On October 17, 2025, TD Cowen reiterated its “Buy” rating on Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) with a $335 […]

headline: Salesforce (CRM) Fell Due to Heightened Investor Concerns
summary: Diamond Hill Capital, an investment management company, released its “Select Fund” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Markets continued their YTD rally in the third quarter, with the Russell 3000 Index surging 8%. At the same time, the portfolio underperformed the Russell 3000 Index, returning 4.98%. To get […]
